#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType AreaOfInterest.

== Name ==

*[CAreaOfInterest AreaOfInterest]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--AreaOfInterest (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Area of interest on a golf course.
			An area of interest contains a name, a list of coordinates of points, and a specification of its type
			limited to a list of valid values.
			
			Note: An AreaOfInterest can be a line (example: Out-of-bound line along a hole).
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  number = xs:nonNegativeInteger  other = xs:string  type = [SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum]>  (name, description?, [CPositionWithSequence position]{2,*}  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || description ||  					Description of an area of interest.				 ||
|| xs:string || name ||  					Name of an area of interest.				 ||
|| [CPositionWithSequence golfml:PositionWithSequence] || [CPositionWithSequence position] ||  Position of a point of the polygon that forms the area of interest ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| number ||  Position of the area of interest in a list of areas of interest || xs:nonNegativeInteger || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| other ||  				Alternate value for an attribute.			 || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| type ||  				Type of area of interest.			 || [SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum golfml:GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPlacemarks Placemarks]
----
    <xs:complexType name="AreaOfInterest">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="description" type="xs:string">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="2" name="position" type="golfml:PositionWithSequence">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence>  <xs:attribute name="number" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger">  </xs:attribute>  <xs:attribute name="type" type="golfml:GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum">  </xs:attribute>  <xs:attributeGroup ref="golfml:Other"/></xs:complexType>
----
